description: Simone Nardini’s Michelin star continues to shine in Terracina in this elegant restaurant which is run by young, well-trained staff. The chef serves exciting, creative cuisine, with a careful preparation and presentation of dishes that will appeal to the eyes and tastebuds alike. There’s also an impressive wine list featuring around 800 different labels.
